posts.post_content:
It appears that there has been another big baseball card find.  I wonder if anything huge comes out of it.  

[url]http://www.foxnews.com/us/2016/06/03/chance-bible-study-encounter-leads-to-discovery-texas-find-massive-trove-baseball-cards.html?intcmp=hpbt4[/url]
The T206 BST seems the wrong place to post an article about a Topps and Bowman find?  And we already know what came out of it, it (or the first part of it) is in LOTG.
Im a dumb @@@.  It happens every time.  I forget what board I am on and post something.

[quote name="Pilot172000" post=1546270]Im a dumb @@@.  It happens every time.  I forget what board I am on and post something.[/QUOTE]

All Aboard the Forum Train on Track 54
